content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.6 out of 5 stars  20 global ratings

excerpt.rendered: Galact Granules, a breastfeeding supplement improves the quality of milk production for lactating mothers. It includes the goodness of natural ingredients like Shatavari, Vidarika, Sowa, Gokshur Panchang, Yashtimadhu, and Safed Jeera in a specialized formulation, completely safe for mothers. Galact comes from the house of Emcure, India’s #1 Gynecologist and women’s healthcare company as per AIOCD.
